title: Share of global net sales of Luxottica by geographical area 2018
summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Geographical area, and Share of net sales in each Geographical area on the y axis.
The maximum Share of net sales 58.0 is found at Geographical area North America and the minimum is found at Rest of the world where Geographical area is 2.0.
Geographical area Rest of the world has 29.0 times less Share of net sales than Geographical area North America which is the highest.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Geographical area in the x axis and Share of net sales in the y axis.
The maximum Share of net sales 58.0 is found at Geographical area North America and the minimum is found at Rest of the world where Geographical area is 2.0.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Geographical area, and Share of net sales in each Geographical area on the y axis.
The maximum Share of net sales 58.0 is found at Geographical area North America and the minimum is found at Rest of the world where Geographical area is 2.0.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of net sales for 5 number of Geographical areas.
The maximum Share of net sales 58.0 is found at Geographical area North America and the minimum is found at Rest of the world where Geographical area is 2.0.
Geographical area Europe has the second highest value for Share of net sales.
Geographical area North America has 29.0 times more Share of net sales than Geographical area Rest of the world which is has the lowest.
The Geographical area North America has the highest Share of net sales, followed by Europe, and Asia-Pacific. Down to the Geographical area Rest of the world which is the lowest.
The Geographical area Rest of the world has 2.9 times less Share of net sales than average.
